extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     SPAN251 or SPAN352.
Corequisites    (SPAN301 and SPAN302) or (SPAN303 and SPAN304).

basic.description: A study of selected works by Spanish American writers such as Horacio Quiroga, Gabriel García Márquez, Jorge Luis Borges, Juan Rulfo, Julio Cortázar and Reinaldo Arenas.
basic.subject: SPAN
basic.title: La narrativa hispanoamericana del siglo 20
